scripts.clean: bun tsc --build --clean packages/core packages/http packages/mcp packages/text packages/cli && rimraf packages/*/dist
scripts.build: bun tsc --build packages/core packages/http packages/mcp packages/text packages/cli
scripts.rebuild: bun run clean && bun run build
scripts.publish:all: bun run build && bun run publish:core && bun run publish:text && bun run publish:http && bun run publish:mcp && bun run publish:cli
